main event: A 13-year-old boy observed a round, smooth or oval-shaped object flying at a low altitude on December 6, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 5 minutes, The object was about 100 to 105 feet in diameter, The object made no noise during the observation, It exhibited unusual maneuvers including straight up, down, and sideways flight, The sighting was at an extremely low altitude of around 20 feet off the ground.
